strapiPost.title: Razorback Greenway Alliance Announces Plans For Improvements
strapiPost.content:
The Razorback Greenway Alliance recently announced some of what’s coming in 2022 for the Razorback Greenway in Northwest Arkansas. 

  • New and improved: In addition to commissioning a fully updated brand identity, the Razorback Greenway Alliance will be expanding the mileage of the Greenway and work on improving its maintenance, facilities, and operational infrastructure. 
  • Miles: The Razorback Greenway currently spans 40 miles through the heart of NWA, beginning at “mile 0” at Kessler Mountain Regional Park in Fayetteville and ending at “mile 40” at Mercy Way Bridge in Bella Vista.

Learn more HERE.
